name: GET_SEGMENT_ID
body_snippet:
FUNCTION GET_SEGMENT_ID(STRCT NUMBER,SEG NUMBER,SEGVAL VARCHAR2,DEPON NUMBER DEFAULT NULL ) RETURN NUMBER IS

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------- THIS FUNCTION RETURNS THE ID OF GIVEN SEGMENT VALUE IT WILL RETURN 0 IF THE ID IS NOT FOUND
------- ITs PARAMETER DETAIL IS GIVEN BELLOW
------- 
------- STRCT 	-> STRUCTURE 
------- SEG     -> SEGMENT NUMBER
------- SEGVAL	-> SEGMENT VALUE 
------- DEPON   -> DEPENDENT ON KEY ID (IN CASE IF THE SEGMENT IS DEPENDENT)
-----------------  DEFAULT IS NULL
	
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

RET NUMBER;
BEGIN

		IF SEG=1 THEN
				SELECT SEGMENT_ID INTO RET
				FROM WIZ_SEGMENT01
				WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = STRCT AND
							SEGMENT_VALUE = SEGVAL AND
							NVL(DEP_ON_KEY_ID,0) = NVL(DEPON,0);
		ELSIF SEG=2 THEN
				SELECT SEGMENT_ID INTO RET
				FROM WIZ_SEGMENT02
				WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = STRCT AND
							SEGMENT_VALUE = SEGVAL AND
							NVL(DEP_ON_KEY_ID,0) = NVL(DEPON,0);
			
		ELSIF SEG=3 THEN
				SELECT SEGMENT_ID INTO RET
				FROM WIZ_SEGMENT03
				WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = STRCT AND
							SEGMENT_VALUE = SEGVAL AND
							NVL(DEP_ON_KEY_ID,0) = NVL(DEPON,0);
			
		ELSIF SEG=4 THEN
				SELECT SEGMENT_ID INTO RET
				FROM WIZ_SEGMENT04
				WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = STRCT AND
							SEGMENT_VALUE = SEGVAL AND
